name: ZooPhobia - Jack's Day Out
description:
ZooPhobia - Jack's Day Out is a ZooPhobia fan game produced by LittleMissHatter

Production into this game will continue in the near future.

Play as Zill, and protect Jack as he enjoys his walk through Safe Haven. Attack enemies, destroy traps and create bridges to protect Jack from his supernatural bad luck.

Game Designed and Programmed by LittleMissHatter
Program Used: Construct 3
Music: "Zoophobia Theme" by Gooseworx
Sound Effect: "Klaxon.wav" by davidou

"ZooPhobia"(2012 Web Comic) and "ZooPhobia - Bad Luck Jack (Short)" are creations and property of Vivienne Medrano (Viviziepop).
All characters belong to Viviziepop.
All images/screenshots taken from "ZooPhobia - Bad Luck Jack (Short)"
